title: Millionaire YouTuber Hank Green tells Gen Z to rethink their Tesla bets—and shares the portfolio changes he’s making to avoid AI-bubble fallout
description: The S&P 500’s record concentration in AI-focused companies like Nvidia, Microsoft, and Google could bear bad news in the event of a bubble pop, says YouTuber Hank Green.

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024's New Crossover Is One You'll Never Expect
description:
Microsoft has announced the next crossover collaboration for Microsoft Flight Simulator 24, and it's none other than Netflix's hugely popular Stranger Things.
"Turn the skies upside down," Microsoft said in its announcement for a collaboration set to come to the game on December 9. The teaser video doesn't give much away, but one possibility is that the upcoming crossover will allow people to fly through Hawkins, the setting of Stranger Things.
If you look closely, you can see the aircraft in question in the video is a UH-1H Huey helicopter with the "Hawkins Heli-Tours" logo emblazoned on it.
Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Irish authorities asked to investigate Microsoft over alleged unlawful data processing by IDF
description:
Move follows Guardian revelations of Israel’s mass surveillance of Palestinians using Microsoft cloud
Irish authorities have been formally asked to investigate Microsoft over alleged unlawful data processing by the Israeli Defense Forces.
The complaint has been made by the human rights group the Irish Council for Civil Liberties (ICCL) to the Data Protection Commission, which has legal responsibility in Europe for overseeing all data processing in the European Union.
 Continue reading...

title: The AI boom is heralding a new gold rush in the American west
description:
Once home to gold and prospectors, the Nevada desert is now the site of a new kind of expansion: tech datacenters
Driving down the interstate through the dry Nevada desert, there are few signs that a vast expanse of new construction is hiding behind the sagebrush-covered hills. But just beyond a massive power plant and transmission towers that march up into the dusty brown mountains lies one of the world’s biggest buildouts of datacenters – miles of new concrete buildings that house millions of computer servers.
This business park, called the Tahoe-Reno Industrial Center, has a sprawling landmass greater than the city of Denver. It is home to the largest datacenter in the US, built by the company Switch, and tech giants like Google and Microsoft have also bought land here and are constructing enormous facilities. A separate Apple datacenter complex is just down the road.

title: Microsoft AI’s design head wants her team to be AI-native by the end of the fiscal year
description: Danzico noted that she helped put together an in-house AI course for her team's 200 employees, to a "tremendously positive" positive response.

title: Red Dead Redemption's New Version Launched With A Big Issue On Xbox
description:
Rockstar Games launched the new version of Red Dead Redemption on modern consoles and mobile today, December 2, but the rollout did not go entirely smoothly on Xbox.
People who already own Red Dead Redemption for Xbox 360 digitally were expecting the new edition for Xbox Series X|S to automatically show up as a free download, but quickly noticed this didn't happen.
This is an issue that Rockstar is aware of and the studio is working with Microsoft to resolve it. "Thank you for your patience," Rockstar said.
Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Apple's AI chief is leaving, and a former Microsoft and Google exec is coming on board
description: John Giannandrea, Apple's AI chief, is leaving the company. Amar Subramanya is joining as vice president of AI.

title: After Xbox Bodywash Comes The Inevitable Next Step: Xbox Crocs
description: Microsoft's next product category has emerged. No, it's not more Xbox bodywash. It's shoes. More specifically, Microsoft is teaming up with Crocs, Inc. for a new line of Xbox-branded Crocs and themed Jibbitz.

title: Microsoft doesn't understand the dislike for Windows' new direction
description: You don't need to ask them twice.

title: Microsoft Will Preload Windows 11 File Explorer to Fix Bad Performance
description: Hello Windows Insiders, today we are releasing Windows 11 Insider Preview Build 26220.7271 (KB5070307) to the Dev & Beta Channels.
